section.title: Installing Oracle
section.p: You can download Oracle 10g (64-bit only) or 11g (64-bit only) here.

subsection.title: How to install Oracle
subsection.p: For specifics on how to install Oracle on different operating systems please refer to Oracle's installation documentation:
If you would like help and advice installing Oracle for use with Mingle Plus please contact the Mingle support team.

section.note: Mingle Plus requires a database charset of AL32UTF8 to work properly. Other charsets could cause unexpected errors with field length validations.
section.p: See our Recommendations for running Mingle Plus on Oracle.
